alt: A narrow rock fin with chains for support on the Angel's Landing hike
title: Angel's Landing Chains
description: The final, thrilling ascent of Angel's Landing, relying on chains bolted into the rock to navigate the narrow spine.

alt: An overlook of the Bryce Canyon amphitheater with its hoodoos
title: Bryce Amphitheater
description: A wide view of the iconic hoodoos and spires that make Bryce Canyon so unique.

alt: White sands and gentle waves at Carmel Beach on a clear day
title: Carmel Shores
description: A peaceful afternoon on the beautiful white sand beaches of Carmel.

alt: A different angle of the hoodoos in Bryce Canyon
title: Canyon Hoodoos
description: A closer look at the intricate formations of the hoodoos, showing the vibrant red and orange rock.

alt: View from the summit of Mission Peak overlooking the Bay Area
title: Mission Peak Summit
description: The classic view from the top of Mission Peak, with the iconic pole and a panoramic look at the South Bay.

alt: Majestic view of the Sierra Nevada mountains from within Sequoia National Park
title: Sierra Nevada Vista
description: A breathtaking landscape showing the rugged, snow-dusted peaks of the Sierra Nevada mountain range.

alt: A giant sequoia tree in a forest covered in fresh snow
title: Winter Giants
description: The serene and silent beauty of the giant sequoias after a fresh snowfall.

alt: View of the San Francisco skyline and Alcatraz from Angel Island
title: View from the Island
description: A clear day offering a perfect view of the San Francisco cityscape and Alcatraz Island from across the bay.

alt: The Sierra Nevada mountain range viewed from an airplane window
title: Sierras from Above
description: Flying over the vast and rugged Sierra Nevada range, with snow-capped peaks stretching as far as the eye can see.

alt: The city of San Francisco and the Bay Bridge viewed from an airplane window
title: Approach to SFO
description: Flying into San Francisco, with a clear view of the city skyline and the Bay Bridge from the plane.
